claim: Prakash Jha is a television director.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Prakash Jha  (  born 27 February 1952  )  is an Indian film producer , actor , director and screenwriter , mostly known for his political and socio-political films such as Damul  (  1984  )  , Mrityudand  (  1997  )  , Gangaajal  (  2003  )  , Apaharan  (  2005  )  , including multistarrer hit movies Raajneeti  (  2010  )  , Aarakshan  (  2011  )  Chakravyuh  (  2012  )  , and Satyagraha  (  2013  )  .
